function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low level of perceived susceptibility to COVID-19","Impact":"Reduced adoption of protective behaviors","Mitigation":"Increase awareness of the seriousness of the pandemic and its health consequences","Technologies":"Public health awareness campaigns, education programs","People":"Study participants in Hong Kong","Owner":"Public health authorities, researchers"},{"Description":"Negative emotion as a predictor of protective behaviors","Impact":"Increased anxiety and stress","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support and coping strategies","Technologies":"Mental health counseling, stress management techniques","People":"General public","Owner":"Mental health professionals, public health organizations"},{"Description":"High risk perception not always associated with high preparedness for natural disasters","Impact":"Reduced readiness for pandemic response","Mitigation":"Enhance preparedness through targeted education and training","Technologies":"Simulation exercises, emergency response planning tools","People":"Community members, government agencies","Owner":"Emergency management agencies, local authorities"}]}
